System.M_MDELCHK101: SELECT RTRIM(COALESCE(MENUGRP_CODE,'')) AS MENUGRP_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(MENUEXE_CODE,'')) AS MENUEXE_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(EXE_NO,'')) AS EXE_NO, COALESCE(SEQ_NO,0) AS SEQ_NO, RTRIM(COALESCE(TABLE_NAME,'')) AS TABLE_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD1,'')) AS WHERE_FLD1, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD2,'')) AS WHERE_FLD2, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD3,'')) AS WHERE_FLD3, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD4,'')) AS WHERE_FLD4, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD5,'')) AS WHERE_FLD5, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD6,'')) AS WHERE_FLD6, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD7,'')) AS WHERE_FLD7, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD8,'')) AS WHERE_FLD8, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD9,'')) AS WHERE_FLD9, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD10,'')) AS WHERE_FLD10 FROM M_MDELCHK ORDER BY MENUGRP_CODE, MENUEXE_CODE, EXE_NO, SEQ_NO
System.M_MDELCHK102: SELECT RTRIM(COALESCE(MENUGRP_CODE,'')) AS MENUGRP_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(MENUEXE_CODE,'')) AS MENUEXE_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(EXE_NO,'')) AS EXE_NO, COALESCE(SEQ_NO,0) AS SEQ_NO, RTRIM(COALESCE(TABLE_NAME,'')) AS TABLE_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD1,'')) AS WHERE_FLD1, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD2,'')) AS WHERE_FLD2, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD3,'')) AS WHERE_FLD3, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD4,'')) AS WHERE_FLD4, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD5,'')) AS WHERE_FLD5, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD6,'')) AS WHERE_FLD6, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD7,'')) AS WHERE_FLD7, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD8,'')) AS WHERE_FLD8, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD9,'')) AS WHERE_FLD9, RTRIM(COALESCE(WHERE_FLD10,'')) AS WHERE_FLD10 FROM M_MDELCHK WHERE 1=1 AND MENUGRP_CODE = ? AND MENUEXE_CODE = ? AND EXE_NO = ? ORDER BY MENUGRP_CODE, MENUEXE_CODE, EXE_NO, SEQ_NO
System.M_MDELCHK103: INSERT INTO M_MDELCHK( MENUGRP_CODE, MENUEXE_CODE, EXE_NO, SEQ_NO, TABLE_NAME, WHERE_FLD1, WHERE_FLD2, WHERE_FLD3, WHERE_FLD4, WHERE_FLD5, WHERE_FLD6, WHERE_FLD7, WHERE_FLD8, WHERE_FLD9, WHERE_FLD10 VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
System.M_MDELCHK104: UPDATE M_MDELCHK SET MENUGRP_CODE= ?, MENUEXE_CODE= ?, EXE_NO= ?, SEQ_NO= ?, TABLE_NAME= ?, WHERE_FLD1= ?, WHERE_FLD2= ?, WHERE_FLD3= ?, WHERE_FLD4= ?, WHERE_FLD5= ?, WHERE_FLD6= ?, WHERE_FLD7= ?, WHERE_FLD8= ?, WHERE_FLD9= ?, WHERE_FLD10= ? WHERE 1=1 AND MENUGRP_CODE = ? AND MENUEXE_CODE = ? AND EXE_NO = ? AND SEQ_NO = ?
